content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE raw_data.sap_marm 
go
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE raw_data.sap_marm (
	[MANDT] varchar(8000),
	[MATNR] varchar(8000),
	[MEINH] varchar(8000),
	[UMREZ] numeric(38,18),
	[UMREN] numeric(38,18),
	[EANNR] varchar(8000),
	[EAN11] varchar(8000),
	[NUMTP] varchar(8000),
	[LAENG] numeric(38,18),
	[BREIT] numeric(38,18),
	[HOEHE] numeric(38,18),
	[MEABM] varchar(8000),
	[VOLUM] numeric(38,18),
	[VOLEH] varchar(8000),
	[BRGEW] numeric(38,18),
	[GEWEI] varchar(8000),
	[MESUB] varchar(8000),
	[ATINN] varchar(8000),
	[MESRT] varchar(8000),
	[XFHDW] varchar(8000),
	[XBEWW] varchar(8000),
	[KZWSO] varchar(8000),
	[MSEHI] varchar(8000),
	[BFLME_MARM] varchar(8000),
	[GTIN_VARIANT] varchar(8000),
	[NEST_FTR] numeric(38,18),
	[MAX_STACK] varchar(8000),
	[CAPAUSE] numeric(38,18),
	[TY2TQ] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/saptable/marm/*/*/*/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO
